title: Need a Duo Partner
body:
**A bit about me:**

- Currently Bronze 5

- Season 4 was Silver 4

- Season 4 created ranked team and made it to gold 4

- Missed out around Season 5

- Haven't played in a while and got to Bronze 5. 

So if anyone is interested add me, looking for a duo partner that can climb with me.

I don't mind what rank/smurf/gender/psycopath you are, as long as you want to climb with me. Feel free to add me:** TheOnlyGuan**

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Hey I would be happy to duo with you I am silver 4 on my other account and bronze 4 this season. Add Me NinjaBow
